text: @realDonaldTrump There is protesting and unrest everyday throughout the nation. COVID-19 numbers are creeping up in some places. And yet you’re concerned about your fucking poll numbers?! SHUT THE FUCK UP AND LEAD! I remain amazed as to how any Republican genuinely believes in this guy.
